results.content: @tumitran·7mSnacks that I actually enjoy, free wifi on board, flight attendants that treat you like a human - this is why I love @JetBlue1
@bmconway24·1h@JetBlue Why is flight 162 delayed from Sacramento to JFK? No prior notice after I had checked in, no one at the gate, just an updated time on the board. Bad communication!!!1
@ashmadluck·1h5 hour delay so far with 3 infants. We were due to board at 10pm and still waiting. Any update for us @JetBlue?1
@katherinewould·2hI’ve never flown @JetBlue before, but this has been a truly miserable experience #neveragain1

@ajbroo01·3h@JetBlue  Great service in FLL tonight with Jessica working gate F10 for flight 2966 FLL-BUF. Also excellent flight crew onboard now! Only bad thing is TVs dont work for seats 11DEF so get to watch static for the next two hours 1

@ajbroo01·2hYeah I checked with the crew. It looks like everyone else's tvs are working so I told them not to do a reset of the whole plane just for 3 seats. Also someone needs to man the exit row just in case so I opted to stay put 1
@ajbroo01·2hReplying to @JetBluethanks for helping out tonight!

@courseoflife1·5hNothing like a 2-5 start to the college football betting today...AND GETTING RECLINED ON all while my @JetBlue tv doesn’t work for the flight. I’m not mad at all @mwrinc I swear The media could not be played.3
@courseoflife1·3hNo, the nightmare is over. thank god I had Auburn cover and the Under hit to get me through the depression1
@stephquinn7·3hHalloween parties are a little different these days. I don’t mind it. #flightcrew @JetBlue @quinnwill24
@CemeteryChick·3hI swear @JetBlue has the smoothest landings  #TrueBlueForLife 1
@stephzell·4hThe time of my flight changed for next month and I am SO annoyed... @JetBlue whyyyyyyyyyy2
@L7sweeney·5h@JetBlue how is my flight B698 delayed 3 hours?! I want to get out of Denver before the snow!1
@L7sweeney·4hReplying to @JetBlueYou do realize a storm is coming and being delayed due to lack of crew is ridiculous?

@Zis4Zachariah·5hmy first time flying @JetBlue have 200k miles on @AmericanAir and I can say easily I will avoid AA in the future at all costs.  Night and day service .  Oh and I’m tweeting this at 36k feet on their free WiFi ....2

@Zis4Zachariah·5hAnd they actually reply to their social media accounts .... list keeps on going.  I thought all airlines had the dollar as what they served.  Seems #jetblue actually puts the customer first ! Wow 1
@xtianishername·5hJust has the most unpleasant customer service experience with my favorite airline @JetBlue I am beyond surprised in how awful that hour long experience was dealing with Jet Blue 11
@Boston_Stats·5hShoutout to @JetBlue for not only deleting my known traveler number but also my gender. No longer TSA Pre Check back to Boston tomorrow.13
@Boston_Stats·5hJust saw this whilst at dinner will have to give customer support a call granted my flight leaves in less than 24 hours.1
@Boston_Stats·5hReplying to @JetBlueJust reached out thank you
@jenrein88·5hWe got stuck in Turks and Caicos for an extra day (I know, how horrible) because the local air traffic controllers went on strike. Bonus honeymoon time!1

@jenrein88·5hNow that I'm back home on the comfort of my own couch, I wanna thank @JetBlue for making the rebooking seamless and actually adding an additional flight so nobody got stuck longer (most other airlines did not do this)21
@GregLargent·7h@JetBlue we are stranded in Barbados overnight, 16+ hour delay. Flight B6 314 to Newark. What can be done to make up for this?1

Join My LinkedIn #21DayChallenge@angelapitter·8hOk @JetBlue one thing to delay nearly 6 hours ... but when were you going to mention you switched from @CocaCola to @pepsi ... really????  If you dump @dunkindonuts for @Starbucks Its a wrap! Don’t say I didn’t warn you 11
@CricketTrott·9h@JetBlue made some extra bucks by charging me extra for more leg room but seems to have also sold my legroom to a great Dane that is drooling on my leg and leather laptop bag.1

@samantha412·13hWow - I’m not having a great first time experience with @JetBlue my flight that was scheduled for 10:20am departure got moved to 12:45, then 2, and now 3PM. This is ridiculous! Get us to our destination already.214

@samantha412·12hUmm now we’re being told that we’re not getting an update until 3 even tho it says we’re departing at 3!  @JetBlue should’ve flown @Delta and got in when our co worker got in. Can’t believe I haven’t gotten a tweet back from @JetBlue yet.. #JetBlueFlashFares14
@samantha412·12hReplying to @JetBlueB6 18771
@aehopler·13hReplying to @JetBlue.@JetBlue is drunk.3

@t2intense·15hHey @JetBlue hopping on a plane to St John!! Looking forward to a phenomenal flight!!13

@falmeidaz·Oct 26Two things @JetBlue 1. Still waiting for Badges feature to come back. When? We need a date!2. Flights are getting delayed more often. Flight 1933 MCO-SJU over an hour late before departure.I know you can do better like always. ~Loyal Customer @falmeidaz11

@John_Chung_Sr·Oct 25@JetBlue first time flying JetBlue.  Headed to BOS from PHL with the entire family.  Great experience and onboard you can actually open your laptop up fully!  And free wifi!  #TheyDontMakeEmLikeThisAnymore1
@KellieEbe·Oct 25@JetBlue help!  I left my wallet on my flight!  What do I do?1
@KellieEbe·Oct 25I filled it out. How long can will it take for a response?  I can’t do anything without my wallet1
@KellieEbe·Oct 25Replying to @JetBlueHow is there no one I can speak with to even see if it was found or if it was still on the plane and back in NY now?!?!
@lorita·Oct 25Can’t say enough about the amazing crew of @JetBlue 1186 tonight- thanks for working so hard to help us make our connections1
@lorita·Oct 25Replying to @JetBlueParticularly Shannon. If not for him, I wouldn’t have made my connection 11

@wdogproductions·Oct 25@JetBlue I wish more services could be as awesome as you. hey I left a purple pencil case full of electronics on my flight. Is there any chance you found it and would want to get it back to me?1
@1aleshalou·17h@JetBlue are flights from New Orleans still leaving?1

@1aleshalou·11hReplying to @JetBlueThanks but my flight has been delayed several times & I missed my anniversary vacation.  If we would've known the flight time would keep changing, we could have driven to another airport & made it on time. I am still stuck at the New Orleans airport and the power is out again.

@MrStealYourGuru·11hReplying to @JetBlue and @EricElanderWhoever your social media person is, they're dropping the ball hardcore on this. I'll make sure to avoid being in the same spot Eric is and choose anything but Jet Blue for my travel. Sounds awful.2
